channel.title: iOS on Ezhes
channel.description: Recent content in iOS on Ezhes

item.title: Benchmarking Popular Markdown Parsers on iOS
item.description: Reddit uses markdown for all of its posts and comments and so I needed a way to parse and render markdown not only well but fast. In the two years I’ve been working on this app of and on I’ve went through multiple differently libraries before I decided it’d be worthwhile to actually go and find the best one once and for all instead of just trying random ones, and so I decided to benchmark the top five I could find.
